about_the_game:
Surviving one more day in a post-apocalyptic world

One more day. That's all that matters in Final Frontier. But where to go to stay alive? Hospitals and supermarkets have been looted, hotels requisitioned by the military.
Every day, you will have to choose where to go to survive, but beware: each place is unique and you will have to face challenges to validate your actions.

Choices that determine your fate

In Final Frontier, every choice you make will have an impact on your story, and your actions will determine your fate. Will you have the courage to be a savior, or will you prefer to fight alone for your survival? Your choices will affect every action you take and will influence the course of your adventure.

Challenges to survive

Each place you choose will have its own challenge to validate your action. This can bring you bonuses that will help you in your journey (food, medicine, weapons) but... it can also bring you to your own demise. Will you be able to face these challenges and find the resources you need to continue to survive?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit operating system and processor required
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2500 3.3GHz ou AMD FX-6300 3.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti ou ATI Radeon HD 6870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit operating system and processor required
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 2600 3.4 GHz ou AMD FX-8350 4.0GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 970 ou AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: In a ruthless post-apocalyptic world, every day counts. Choose carefully where to hide to avoid the dangers of the hostile environment and deadly enemies. Overcome every challenge to survive one more day. Are you ready to take on the challenge and stay alive?
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support
